posts.post_content:
I am looking for any T205's with American Beauty, Cycle, Piedmont 42, and maybe a Broadleaf.  I would prefer SGC graded 4's and higher but will take any condition raw or graded.  Also if you have any I need for my registry in SGC (or can cross to SGC) 4's and higher.  Here is a link to my registry list:

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=794&userset=2843[/url]

Please send scans and prices to me @ [url]pup6913@hotmail.com[/url].

Andrew
I have a Broadleaf Downey and a Red Murray American Beauty both in rough shape if interested let me know.
Mike
Thanks Mike money is in the mail
Had alot of great buys last time guys.  Small bump for a few more.  Let me know what you got

I have a few different T205 backs at my web site if you're interested:
[url]http://imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]
Best regards,
Mike
Email sent with a list of available cards.
